resources.string: Recording in progress. Press stop to end the recording or select to the recording notification to view it.
Playback in progress. Press stop to end the playback or select the playback notification to view it.
Before we send it out privately to %s, maybe you want to add some more info?
You\'re the first of your friends to join SoundCloud. Check out new sounds from our Suggested People.
Hmm. You don’t have any sounds in your Stream.\n\n Start following people to listen to their sounds!
On Facebook? Connect with friends already on SoundCloud!
Oh no! Your sounds don’t have any comments or likes. But you can change that by making your sounds social!\n\n Share your sounds with friends and social networks to get Activity on your sounds.
Find out more about sharing sounds with our 101s
This is where you’ll see who’s liked and commented on your sounds. But you need to create some sounds first!\n\n Record your first sound and share it with friends and to your social networks.
Find out more about sharing sounds with our 101s
Okay! It’s time to make some sounds.\n\n Create a memo, message or melody and share it with the world!
You don’t have any followers yet. But you can change that! The best way to get people to follow you is to share your sounds with others.
Check your settings to automatically share your original sounds to your social networks
You don’t have any followers yet. But you can change that! Create sounds for people to listen to and you\'ll have followers in no time.
Check your settings to automatically share your original sounds to your social networks
Hey! SoundCloud is much more fun when you follow people! Find interesting people to follow to listen to their latest sounds.
You haven’t liked any sounds yet. Click the little heart button to show some love to other people\’s sounds.\n\n Not hearing sounds you like? Try the Suggested People for interesting new sounds
This person hasn\'t added a profile description yet.
Your profile is empty. Let people know about you!
